member.name: T:Ranorex.NativeItem
member.summary: This element represents a native item (a logical part of a win32 control).

member.summary: Creates a new adapter instance. This constructor is used internally by the Ranorex Core Framework for performance issues!

member.summary: Creates a new adapter instance.
member.param: The element to create the adapter for.
member.exception: If the element does not support the capabilities required by this adapter.

member.name: M:Ranorex.NativeItem.op_Implicit(System.String)~Ranorex.NativeItem
member.summary: Implicitly converts a string to an instance of this class by searching the root.
member.remarks: The is used to search for the specified path.
member.exception: If the specified is not valid.
If the element does not support the capabilities required by this adapter.

member.exception: If the element does not support the capabilities required by this adapter.

member.summary: The item command id.
